background_contextMenuConfigured_no_acco.message: There are no matching Items for this domain
background_contextMenuConfigured_no_acco.description: Message displayed when no login items match the current domain in the context menu

background_contextMenuConfigured_add_acc.description: Option in the context menu to add a new account for the current domain

background_contextMenuConfigured_cards.description: Submenu title for payment cards in the context menu

background_contextMenuNotConfigured_conn.message: Connect with the 2FAS Pass mobile app...
background_contextMenuNotConfigured_conn.description: Option to connect the extension with the 2FAS Pass mobile app

background_get_browser_info_on.description: Used in generating the browser extension name, e.g., Chrome on Windows

notification_card_autofill_no_data_title.description: Title for the notification when the card has no data to autofill

notification_card_autofill_no_data_messa.message: This card has no data to autofill
notification_card_autofill_no_data_messa.description: Message for the notification when the card has no data to autofill

notification_card_autofill_partial_title.description: Title for the notification when card autofill is only partially successful

notification_card_autofill_year_not_avai.message: The expiry year is not available in the form options
notification_card_autofill_year_not_avai.description: Message when the card expiry year doesn't match any available option in the form's year dropdown

notification_card_autofill_month_not_ava.message: The expiry month is not available in the form options
notification_card_autofill_month_not_ava.description: Message when the card expiry month doesn't match any available option in the form's month dropdown

notification_card_autofill_expiration_da.message: The expiry date is not available in the form options
notification_card_autofill_expiration_da.description: Message when the card expiry date doesn't match any available option in the form's dropdown

notification_card_autofill_no_inputs_tit.description: Title for the notification when no card input fields are detected on the page

notification_card_autofill_no_inputs_mes.message: This page doesn't have any card input fields that can be autofilled.
notification_card_autofill_no_inputs_mes.description: Message for the notification when no card input fields are detected on the page
